summary: Secret agent Matt Helm must battle foreign spies and a rogue nation's exiled ruler in order to recover a hijacked U.S. government experimental flying saucer.

keywords: pokies|spilling coffee|espionage|engagement ring|eating a hard boiled egg
title: Emboscada a Matt Helm
